<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Jaidi (The Blessing and Bounty)](/Deities.aspx?ID=155)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>
<trait label="NG" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
</traits>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 130 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Other Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=2)

**Edicts** Encourage hard work that benefits all, ensure the health of crops and vegetation

**Anathema** Destroy healthy crops, waste food, refuse to help others in your community

**Follower Alignments**
LG, NG, N

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Ability](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Constitution

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Skill** [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)

**Favored Weapon** [Scythe](/Weapons.aspx?ID=39)

**Domains** [Family](/Domains.aspx?ID=11), [Might](/Domains.aspx?ID=20), [Nature](/Domains.aspx?ID=22), [Sun](/Domains.aspx?ID=29)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** 

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Temporary Tool](/Spells.aspx?ID=590)

- **2nd**
[Shape Wood](/Spells.aspx?ID=277)

- **3rd**
[Wall of Thorns](/Spells.aspx?ID=366)

</column>
name: Jaidi (The Blessing and Bounty)
